title: Gazebo crash at launch with a "Host not found"

content.raw:
When I try to launch gazebo 1.2.3 (compiled from the tarball), I get a "host not found". I attached the detailed log.
I had to change a few lines to build with Boost 1.50 were because boost::filesystem v2 is deprecated in Boost >= 1.50. It was mostly a matter of inserting some explicit path->string convertions at a few places.
I am under Arch Linux here is my uname -a : Linux biohazard-arch 3.5.6-1-ARCH SMP PREEMPT Sun Oct 7 19:30:49 CEST 2012 x86_64 GNU/Linux
